entries.description: Minimum SAM CLI version has been increased to 0.14.1
You can now specify a docker network when locally running a Lambda
You can now specify if SAM should skip checking for newer docker images when invoking local Lambda functions
Add Gradle based SAM project template
Java8 functions using `sam build` can now be deployed
Building of Python based Lambda functions has been migrated to using `sam build`. This adds the option to use a container-based build during local run/debug of Lambda functions.
The AWS CLI config and credential files are now monitored for changes. Changes automatically take effect.
Add option to use a container-based build during serverless application deployment
Enable support for running, debugging, and deploying Python 3.7 lambdas
Building of Java 8 based Lambda functions has been migrated to using `sam build` (Maven and Gradle are supported).
Fix sort order for CloudFormation nodes in the AWS Explorer
Clarify validation error when SAM CLI is too old
Fix issue where 'Edit Credentials' action didn't check for both 'config' and 'credentials'
Fix issue where the cancel button in the Serverless Deploy progress dialog did nothing
Improve 'Invalid AWS Credentials' messaging to include error details
Unable to edit AWS credential file via pycharm (#759)
Fix issue where invalid AWS Credentials prevent plugin startup
Require SAM run configurations to have an associated credential profile (#526)
